amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Supportive Housing for the Elderly by $100 million and Supportive Housing for the Disabled by $40 million and decreases funding for HUD Annual Contributions for Assisted Housing, section 8 contracts, by $140 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the funds appropriated in the bill for elderly and disabled housing assistance by $140 million and $40 million respectively. The amendment would reduce funds appropriated for the Annual Contributions to Assisted Housing (Section 8 multi-family housing) by a comparable amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lazio amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 353 - 61 (Roll no. 272).
